amendment.description: Amendment sought to make the ownership cost limitation in New York and Ohio State law the minimum standard of protection in the bill; and also sought to direct the Federal Reserve Board to issue regulations providing detailed criteria or a formula calculating the cash price for rental property together with additional criteria for adjusting the cash price for previously used property.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 1 printed in H. Rept. 107-661 to incorporate the standard for limiting the total purchase price of rental-purchase merchandise from New York, Ohio, and Nebraska state law, and establish a process for determining standards in regulation for determining the cash price of rental-purchase merchandise.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaFalce amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 232 (Roll no. 392).
